issue.title: [C++][Python] CMake cannot find Arrow/Arrow Python when building PyArrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17577](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17577). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

I am calling cmake with these flags:

              ..

and building python with 
```java

python setup.py build_ext --inplace 
```
 

 

cc `[~kou]`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17577?focusedCommentId=17598629) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Sorry for your inconvenient...
I think that you have `PKG_CONFIG_PATH=$ARROW_HOME/lib/pkgconfig` environment variable. You need to set `CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=$ARROW_HOME` environment variable instead to find `Arrow` and other CMake packages.

I'll update related documents by ARROW-17575.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17577?focusedCommentId=17598794) by Alenka Frim (alenka):*
Thank you Kou, this fix solves the issue for me!
